name: Asteroid Arena (itch)
description:
The space lords have sent you into their asteroid arena for their entertainment!  Shoot the asteroids to survive as long as possible!

Enter and leave full screen mode at any time by pressing 'f'.

Use the arrow keys to fly around:  up/down for thrust, and left/right to rotate your ship.

How to shot teh gun:  press CTRL.

Your ship has a reserve of energy, and when depleted, steadily regenerates over time.  Shooting consumes energy, as well as shields to protect you from impact.  Don't shoot too much, or you won't survive too many collisions!

This is my first game.  I'm a professional software engineer, and wanted to escape from the politics and process to do something more fun.  I did all the graphics myself, and the sounds were borrowed from free packages in the unity asset store.

Thanks for playing!
